channel.title: Forum-Based ToL
channel.description:
There are multiple websites that play Mafia on a forum and I thought it could be done here Obviously some abilities wouldn't work( RIP Troll Box) but I think it could be fun and also a good way to test suggested roles without the devs having to code them just to find out they don't work very well
IDK

item.title: Forum-Based ToL
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I’m not sure how popular Forum ToL would be in comparison to just going to FM or MS. A good idea, but it would need to get something really right to attract the playerbase.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum-Based ToL
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
That was my idea too, yes

Read full topic

item.title: Forum-Based ToL
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Hmm… If we get more requests and can find some volunteer moderators (for that specific forum topic), I’d be interested.

However, at this time it would be purely community-run so the devs can finish the game itself perhaps something more official or intelligently automated (such as a Discord bot: something I’m good at coding) can auto mod on the future!

Just some thoughts.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum-Based ToL
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Jordarrian:

(dangit how do i quote on this forum)

Highlight the text you want to quote and then a button comes up saying “quote reply”, click it

item.description:
I second this. There are separate mods in the forums. Admins, Global Mods, and Forum Mafia mods

item.title: Forum-Based ToL
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
FadeBlade:

this would take a while to make time that could be spent making the game better

I get that, but it doesn’t necessarily have to be a developer running it, on the ToS Forums it is run by a different set of people entirely

Read full topic

item.title: Forum-Based ToL
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
the person who moderates would need everyone to whisper what they will do force ability to be used etc

this would take a while to make time that could be spent making the game better

Read full topic

item.description:

As in, someone moderates, there are day and night phases
Stuff like that
